name: Hexa Puzzle 7
description:
Game Description:With thousands of players to promote play,overturns the creative eliminate mobile game.

Game Features:How far is it to 7 distance?Players need to careful think,once you move wrong,and it's could be game over!If you "abuse" by the game,please don't drop the phone!

Playing Method:The bottom of the screen will appear a group of numbers,arbitrary rotation digital group,players need to put thr square on the board,when the three same and adjacent numbers adds together as complete eliminate the score,eventually players need to adds the number to 7 in the board ,but the board range of small,numbers are random and challenging.Hurry to show!
